message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is worth $120 to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. Let me know if this works for you!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the discount, I'm looking to pay closer to $105.  Let me know if that works for you.
I understand your position, Bob. I'm glad you're interested in our product. To better accommodate your budget, how about we agree on $107 for the product? Let me know what you think.
